pages.text: Poppets are small dolls bound to a target, usually the owner, in order to protect them from all manner of harm. That being said, Poppets may also be used by witches who wish to cast voodoo on those who oppose them. Poppets may either be carried on the witchâ€™s person, or placed on a special shelf to keep them safe. $(o)Spanish Moss is vital to the creation of Poppets, so a trip to the swamp may be a good idea.

The base poppet for all your crafting, does nothing and cannot be bound. $(br)$(o)Note: Poppets must be bound to become active. Bind poppets by holding a poppet in one hand and a taglock of the target another
Like its armor variant, the poppet will break instead of your tool, preserving it for one last use.
Has a chance to make attackers drop their weapons
Helps you cheat death, just once
Protects the owner from drowning for a short while
Reduces starvation damage and feeds the user a little bit
Redirects damage you are taking to whoever its bound to. $(r)Must be carried in inventory
Protects from vampiric and voodoo poppets. (W.I.P)
Bound it to a target and right click with Bone Needles in your inventory will deal some damage to said target.
Induces hunger for whoever attacks the owner of this poppet
